programme.title: Remy & Boo
programme.desc: Remy fawns over Mia's adorable toy and Boo grows jealous of it until he discovers that there's nothing stronger than a bond between best friends.

programme.title: Gary's Magic Fort
programme.desc: While at the carnival, Gary gets upset when he thinks his friends are trying to make the games easier for Stuffy; with their help, Gary learns that making things fair for everyone is the way to go.
